titles.title: Designating the week of May 1, 2023, through May 7, 2023, as "Tardive Dyskinesia Awareness Week".
Designating the week of May 1, 2023, through May 7, 2023, as "Tardive Dyskinesia Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of Tardive Dyskinesia Awareness Week. Tardive dyskinesia is a movement disorder characterized by involuntary and uncontrolled movements of muscles in the face, torso, and extremities. It is caused by prolonged use of certain medications, including ones used to treat schizophrenia.
